description: Is shame an automatic consequence of poverty? Can one be poor without being ashamed of it? A lecture from Professor Robert Walker, University of Oxford.
itunes:subtitle: Is shame an automatic consequence of poverty? Can one be poor without being ashamed of it? A lecture from Professor Robert Walker, University of Oxford.

title: Does Shame Always Go Hand in Hand With Poverty? Answers From an International Comparative Study
